string-array.name: fullchangelog
string-array.item: @array/v74
@array/v73

string-array.name: v74
string-array.item: seventyfour — STABLE
IMPORTANT: If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES AFTER APPLYING/UPDATING!
Cleaned out all excluded files and empty folders within the theme - rebased all local files and folders
Fix up broken autorotate QS tile for 5.0.2 ROMs
Fix unreadable text and theme emoji body for WhatsApp Material
dm // colors: Hardcode Play Store colors to fix up unpleasant text colors
dm // colors: Organize cdt base activator folder integrity and structure

string-array.name: v73
string-array.item: sixtysix — seventythree
Fix Inbox\'s popup menus and styles
Theme static QS icons for ROMs that are using non AVD toggles for custom colors
Remove AppSearch background for Materinova, caused black on black text
Fixed up Materinova Settings where there were hardcoded white backgrounds, fixing white on white text.
BLACKED OUT: Fixed Hangouts chat bubbles
Clean up and optimize all asset files
Update notification icon color from grey to white
Attempt to fix low battery color in status bar
Theme Power Icon in QS header
Add new Bliss Interface icons
Theme VindicatorOTA
Clean up unused overlays like Youtube, as well as clean up WhatsApp unused colors allowing custom themed versions to work
Add support for latest Bliss navigation bar customizations
Remove pulsating bluetooth animated statusbar icon
Make network activity icons in status bar transparent as it didn\'t scale properly
Revert Dark Google Search Settings to fix black on black for devices with OK Google training support
Remove Gallery3d\'s styles.xml to attempt fixing Gallery FC
Add Euphoria OTA and Touch Control support
Change light accent to grey (to target black on black issues on Validus and other ROMs)
Clean out MultiROM Manager Overlay
FRAMEWORK: A new approach to fix popup menu colors/overflow menu colors
Theme Materinova v4.0 public version
Theme MusixMatch notification icons and text and fix popup colors black on black, white on white
Remove vertical signal data connected text in status bar, use horizontal instead
Fix up Messenger\'s Popup Menu background
Prepare for Bliss Logo replacement in No Recent Apps
Clean out framework xmls, shrunken down to less than 100 lines each file
Fix up black on black on new screen pinning dialog
Change ripple shape/dimensions for nav bar
Change WhatsApp Material Fab icon color
Change Messenger\'s Accent Color to fix white on white in text dialog
Fix PAC-ROM Icons in Settings
Fix Resurrection Remix Tools Icon in Settings
